Message.Msg: Obviously the guy's financial acumen is not questionable, but the fiscal cliff is a tax on everyone. Removing tax money and distributing it to the government doesn't change the fact the economy will be sent into a recession. The guys with all the money couldn't support the markets during the 1929 crash. Why expect them to be able to support it now. Short term increase in price due to Buffett and likely move back down again as economy sours and credit rating is downgraded again. I am in cash. Sold IBM at 191 for loss.

Topic.Title: IBM price is the same as last year although IBM earns $1.60/shr more

Message.Msg: Yes , but this year people seems resigned to the idea we will go into a deeper recession due to tax hikes from fiscal cliff. Even if IBM does better, the price goes down due to recession. Just like PHilipp Morris. Doesn't cigarette consumption increase in a sour economy. They hit bottom in 2009 even though they did ok.

Message.Title: When will IBM start...
Message.Msg: buying bk shares and prevent this insane free fall in value?

Message.Title: In my opinion
Message.Msg: investors need to understand, when a person such as W. Buffet buys additional shares, in his mind, the near term PPS is meaningless. He knows IBM is buying back shares therefore, as an institutional investor, he owns a larger portion of the company and his "share" becomes more and more valuable. Regarding IBM buying back shares, they have the same exact posture. Would you rather buy at full retail or when something is on sale? The near term PPS is meaningless, and in fact better for them if it's lower. They get to buy back more shares. Traders interests and long term investor interests are not necessarily aligned.

Message.Msg: I figure we got another 10% to go before anyone in Washington takes notice. Then Obama goes and plays a little round ball and the markets drop another 5%. " I WILL NOT SIGN ANY LAW WITHOUT A TAX INCREASE ON THE RICH"!! . I LUV DEM PLAYING CHICKEN WITH YOUR MONEY! Have a pleasant 4 more years...

Topic.Title: Liberals stood in line to vote for this

Message.Msg: when america defied england our revolutionary heroic geniuses created idocuments insuring independence and freedom FROM government,but then an entirely different mentality prevailed. usa became libertarian by constitution and bill of rights, to the point of declaring the RIGHT of citizens to defend themselves AGAINST any real threat of repressive or abusive government taking power from the people. but there was always the potential of freedoms taken away through the electoral process. thus came taxation by government with redistribution of cash and benefits to those voting for the particular political party bestowing them favors.........eventually granting "free" houses to those deemed needy community development which led to economic collapse as price increases (double, triple digit gains) ensued leading to decree by former pres clinton to be capital gains tax FREE and in insane rush to houses without collateral, the house of taxpayer financed greed collapsed....and guess who was on the hook??? today "favors" bestowed add up to sixteen trillions of dollars of national debt... so WHO Is todays voter? genetics are important here and you see this in states red and blue. and those people years past libertarian and independent in nature are shrinking in numbers. the country has changed dramatically (witness obamacare) with government soon in control of what options are made available in medical treatments. soon this affects research and development of drugs which necessarily must be pricey to make success worthwhile. former independent libertarian types wishing mostly to earn and invest for their kids futures and their retirements will be swept into history, change is here via the ballot box and theres no going back....
Thanks
What do you guys have to say now?
